about_the_game:
Unlock the generous Anno 1800™ Cosmetic Pack Bundle #2 and enhance your city with the Cosmetic Packs 7 to 16! This cosmetic bundle includes:

• Seasonal Decorations Pack: Transform your city with 24 festive ornaments for every season.

• Industrial Zone Pack: Embrace the spirit of progress with over 20 industrial-themed ornaments.

• Old Town Pack: Infuse your city with the charm of historical old towns with a mix of more than 20 themed ornaments and skins.

• Dragon Garden Pack: Celebrate the New Year with vibrant dragon-themed districts thanks to 15 ornaments.

• Fiesta Pack: Bring the cultural vibrancy of the New World to your neighborhoods with a combination of 20+ ornaments and skin variations.

• National Park Pack: Create serene parks and lakes for a natural retreat with 20+ ornaments and systems.

• Eldritch Pack: Add a touch of mystery with 20+ Gothic and Victorian-style decorations.

• Steampunk Pack: Give your city an alternative, steampunk-inspired look with this pack of 18 ornaments and skins.

• Pirate Cove Pack: Turn your coasts into adventurous pirate havens through 21 daring skins and ornaments.

• End of An Era Pack: Celebrate the grand finale with 27 festive and celebratory decorations!

Time to beautify your islands like never before!
detailed_description:
Unlock the generous Anno 1800™ Cosmetic Pack Bundle #2 and enhance your city with the Cosmetic Packs 7 to 16! This cosmetic bundle includes:

• Seasonal Decorations Pack: Transform your city with 24 festive ornaments for every season.

• Industrial Zone Pack: Embrace the spirit of progress with over 20 industrial-themed ornaments.

• Old Town Pack: Infuse your city with the charm of historical old towns with a mix of more than 20 themed ornaments and skins.

• Dragon Garden Pack: Celebrate the New Year with vibrant dragon-themed districts thanks to 15 ornaments.

• Fiesta Pack: Bring the cultural vibrancy of the New World to your neighborhoods with a combination of 20+ ornaments and skin variations.

• National Park Pack: Create serene parks and lakes for a natural retreat with 20+ ornaments and systems.

• Eldritch Pack: Add a touch of mystery with 20+ Gothic and Victorian-style decorations.

• Steampunk Pack: Give your city an alternative, steampunk-inspired look with this pack of 18 ornaments and skins.

• Pirate Cove Pack: Turn your coasts into adventurous pirate havens through 21 daring skins and ornaments.

• End of An Era Pack: Celebrate the grand finale with 27 festive and celebratory decorations!

Time to beautify your islands like never before!

short_description: Get the second Anno 1800™ Cosmetic Pack Bundle and customize your city as you wish with the latest ten cosmetic DLCs!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
